decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Brainstorm, then bring them back to the battlefield with Reanimate and Animate Dead. The deck also includes disruption cards like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo. It aims to win the game by reanimating big threats like Archon of Cruelty or Atraxa, Grand Unifier, while using cards like Wasteland and Daze to slow down the opponent's game plan and control the board.

This deck focuses on quick, efficient plays to disrupt the opponent's game plan while also building up tempo through countermagic and removal. The deck aims to control the board with cards like Fatal Push and Force of Will, while also utilizing cards like Daze and Brazen Borrower to maintain pressure and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The inclusion of Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides card advantage and helps generate further tempo swings. The creatures in the deck, such as Murktide Regent and Nethergoyf, serve as finishers to close out the game quickly once the opponent is sufficiently disrupted.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying powerful Eldrazi creatures to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. By utilizing Eldrazi Temple and Eye of Ugin to ramp into threats like Thought-Knot Seer and It That Heralds the End, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while applying pressure. Chalice of the Void and Wasteland help to control the board and slow down the opponent's strategy, while cards like Lotus Petal and Once Upon a Time provide consistency and acceleration. Overall, the goal is to establish a dominant board presence and close out the game quickly.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through disruption and removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Prismatic Ending, as well as counterspells like Force of Will and Force of Negation. It also utilizes card advantage with cards like Ponder and Brainstorm, and has ways to protect itself with Leyline Binding and Teferi, Time Raveler. Additionally, it includes powerful threats like Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath and Murktide Regent to close out the game. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the control game plan and ensure consistency in casting spells.

This deck focuses on quickly assembling the Painter's Servant and Grindstone combo to mill the opponent's deck. The deck includes cards like Goblin Welder and Goblin Engineer to tutor for key pieces, as well as disruption spells like Pyroblast and Red Elemental Blast to protect the combo. Agatha's Soul Cauldron and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker provide additional value and alternate win conditions. With efficient mana sources like Ancient Tomb and City of Traitors, this deck aims to win the game before the opponent can set up their own game plan.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and efficiently reanimate powerful creatures, such as Griselbrand and Archon of Cruelty, using cards like Entomb, Reanimate, and Dance of the Dead. It aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan by utilizing cards like Cabal Therapy and Thoughtseize to remove key threats from their hand. The inclusion of cards like Lotus Petal and Dark Ritual allows for explosive plays that can set up game-winning combos with cards like Worldgorger Dragon. Overall, this deck is designed to overwhelm the opponent with powerful reanimation strategies.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and efficiently get powerful creatures onto the battlefield using cards like Show and Tell, Sneak Attack, and Omniscience. By leveraging these cards along with Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Emrakul, the Aeons Torn, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with high-impact creatures and win the game through a powerful combo. The deck also includes control elements like Force of Will and Brainstorm to protect the combo and ensure its success. The goal is to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent through a well-executed game plan.

The main concept of this Mono Black Aggro deck is to quickly and aggressively pressure the opponent by playing efficient creatures and disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while also building a board presence with powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Barrowgoyf. Using cards like Dark Ritual and Chrome Mox to accelerate their mana, the deck looks to overwhelm the opponent with early threats and finish the game quickly before the opponent can recover.

The main idea of this Legacy Combo - Show and Tell deck is to quickly cheat powerful creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn onto the battlefield using cards like Sneak Attack and Show and Tell. Atraxa, Grand Unifier helps support the overall combo strategy. The deck aims to ramp up mana with cards like Lotus Petal and Ancient Tomb, while also including essential control elements like Force of Will and Brainstorm to protect the combo. The deck also includes additional utility with cards like Ponder and Vexing Bauble.

The key strategy of this Mono Black Aggro deck is to disrupt the opponent's hand with cards like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize while removing threats with Fatal Push and Go for the Throat. The deck also utilizes aggressive creatures like Dauthi Voidwalker and Stalactite Stalker to apply pressure on the opponent. Additionally, the deck includes graveyard synergies with cards like Barrowgoyf and Orcish Bowmasters. The mana base includes fetch lands like Marsh Flats and Verdant Catacombs to ensure consistency in casting spells while also disrupting the opponent's mana base with cards like Wasteland.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize control elements such as counterspells and removal spells to disrupt the opponent's game plan while simultaneously stifling their abilities to prevent them from taking action. The deck aims to maintain board presence with threats like Murktide Regent and Phyrexian Dreadnought while also utilizing card draw and filtering effects to find the necessary pieces for a victory. The mana base is designed to support the deck's control elements while also providing flexibility in casting spells of different colors.
